plot: While hosting a party for her husband's birthday, June discovers that you may be able to choose your friends, but you can't choose your family...or your husband's family... or your husbands friends for that matter.
title: Stan & June's: 12pm
plot_es: While hosting a party for her husband's birthday, June discovers that you may be able to choose your friends, but you can't choose your family...or your husband's family... or your husbands friends for that matter.
plot_en: While hosting a party for her husband's birthday, June discovers that you may be able to choose your friends, but you can't choose your family...or your husband's family... or your husbands friends for that matter.
